name: DevCycle
headline: Feature Flag Management Built for Developers
description:
DevCycle empowers development teams with seamless management of code deployment and feature releases. Our flexible and integrated Feature Management solution, specifically designed for developers, grants teams full control over their feature flags while preventing the accumulation of tech debt. With our scalable and cost-efficient platform, teams can focus on what truly matters—building exceptional software—without being bogged down by the complexities of feature management.

Previously known as Taplytics, born at Y Combinator in Silicon Valley as an A/B Testing and Experimentation solution for product and marketing teams, we have evolved into DevCycle, a trusted Feature Management Solution utilized by some of the world's largest brands. Serving millions of end-users and launching billions of events, we understand the demands of high-scale operations.

founders.name: Andrew Norris, Founder/COO
founders.description: COO and Co-Founder, here to help with anything B2B sales, A/B testing, Finance, Operations, etc.

Fast, Dependable, and Scalable
## Architected for Scale and Reliability
Serve your flags from DevCycle’s scalable, low-latency, and fault-tolerant edge network with automatic fallbacks to safe defaults and local caching.
0+ Years
Experience Building Feature Flags
0 Billion
Evaluations Daily
0 Million
Devices Running DevCycle
## Features that make flagging simple and understandable.
[![deploy](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/icon-deploy.a523ef3c.svg)Deploy Updates in RealtimeReduce time to recovery by instantly rolling out fixes without rerunning or refreshing applications.![](http://devcycle.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-deploy.dc66d59a.png&w=3840&q=75)](http://devcycle.com/</features/realtime-updates>)[![calendar](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/icon-calendar.b91c1a92.svg)Gradual RolloutsReduce the impact of bugs or issues by gradually releasing a feature to a subset of users and quickly rollback changes if needed.![](http://devcycle.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-rollout.7ddfe131.png&w=3840&q=75)](http://devcycle.com/</features/feature-rollouts>)
[![ab](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/icon-ab.c35a54f8.svg)A/B Testing & ExperimentationValidate features before wide release and make data-driven decisions by running experiments on features created on DevCycle.![](http://devcycle.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-abtest.d64263e3.png&w=3840&q=75)](http://devcycle.com/</experimentation>)[![vis](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/icon-visibility.b8a3c6f7.svg)Flag Status VisibilityGain full visibility and insight into which features are running in each of your environments, and who they're impacting.![](http://devcycle.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-flagstatus.ae149702.png&w=3840&q=75)](http://devcycle.com/<https:/docs.devcycle.com/best-practices/feature-grouping>)
[![perm](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/icon-permission.cd5aa21a.svg)Roles and PermissionsMaintain control and oversight over which team members are authorized to make changes to feature flags in production.![](http://devcycle.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-permission.a176be0a.png&w=3840&q=75)](http://devcycle.com/<https:/docs.devcycle.com/platform/security-and-guardrails/permissions>)[![optin](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/icon-optin.60f71bd4.svg)Feature Opt-InCustomize user experiences and test beta features by allowing customers to self-select their preferred features.![](http://devcycle.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-optin.485b34bc.png&w=3840&q=75)](http://devcycle.com/</features/feature-opt-in>)
Built on Battle-Tested Industry Standards
## Part of the OpenFeature Ecosystem
DevCycle is the top feature flag management platform for developers building with OpenFeature.
  * Open-Source SDKsFully transparent, up to date, and supported by developers from the open-source community.
  * No Vendor Lock-InEasily export your full project configuration at any time.
  * Built-In Support for OpenFeature SDKsSeamlessly swap providers whenever you'd like.


[Learn About OpenFeature](http://devcycle.com/<https:/openfeature.dev/>)
![open feature splash image](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/open-feature-splash.3585c933.svg)
## Easily Understand and Manage Your Feature Flags
Because feature flagging should be simple.
  * Complete visibility into all features across your organization enables teams to understand what's running and where, through an intuitive and user-friendly dashboard.
  * Developer integrations and tooling give your organization full control and visibility into the creation, management and monitoring of your feature flags in code.
  * Easily track and monitor the development lifecycle of your features using feature flag statuses.


[Learn More](http://devcycle.com/<https:/docs.devcycle.com>)[See for Yourself](http://devcycle.com/<https:/app.devcycle.com/signup>)
![a hierarchy of features being released in development, staging, and production environments](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/leaders.477f7d70.svg)
## DevCycle Empowers Developers to Ship Faster
SDKs, integrations and tools built for Devs.
  * Create and manage feature flags via API or using DevCycle code generation integrations.
  * Clear and concise technical documentation means an easy implementation or migration.
  * Reduce technical debt by tracking the lifecycle status of features and marking stale flags for clean up.


[See Our SDK Docs](http://devcycle.com/<https:/docs.devcycle.com/sdk/>)[Try Now](http://devcycle.com/<https:/app.devcycle.com/signup>)
![magnifying glass highlighting features in code](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/developers.f0eeeca2.svg)
## Reduce Risk by Rolling Out New Features Safely
Reliability and control by design.
  * Progressively rollout features to reduce the risk of issues or bugs and quickly rollback or toggle features off if issues or bugs occur.
  * Run A/B tests to gather data and feedback before committing more resources to building a fully fledged feature.
  * Reduce your risk of vendor lock-in by using DevCycle OpenFeature SDKs.


[Learn More](http://devcycle.com/<https:/docs.devcycle.com/extras/advanced-targeting/rollouts>)[Get Started](http://devcycle.com/<https:/app.devcycle.com/signup>)
![product metrics and charts showing feature usage and adoption over time](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/product-managers.4ce28a0a.svg)
## We Don't Charge by Seat
Because feature flagging is a team sport
At DevCycle, we believe teams get the most value out of feature management platforms when everyone has access. This is why we offer [usage-based pricing](http://devcycle.com/</pricing>).No matter your team size, every DevCycle plan includes full access to our integrations, so you can spend more time building features and less time worrying about costs.
[See Pricing](http://devcycle.com/</pricing>)
![multiple roles collaborating to build great software](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/team.8da11cc1.svg)
![decorative dots](http://devcycle.com/_next/static/media/dots.c91fd740.svg)
![logos of available devcycle integrations](http://devcycle.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fintegrations.374dac6f.png&w=3840&q=75)
Get integrated with DevCycle
## Wide API, SDK, and Integration Coverage
Whether you are building for the web, back-end servers, or mobile devices, we've got you covered.
[15+SDKs ](http://devcycle.com/</features/sdks>)[10+Integrations ](http://devcycle.com/</features/integrations>)

generated_description:
**DevCycle: Empowering Developers with Feature Flag Management**

Founded in 2011 and originally known as Taplytics, DevCycle emerged from the prestigious halls of Y Combinator's W14 batch. Today, it stands as a robust solution in the realm of feature flag management, specifically crafted for developers who want to take control of their code deployment and feature releases without succumbing to technical debt.

**Mission Statement**
DevCycle champions the idea that feature flag management should be straightforward and user-friendly. Their mission is to deliver a platform that enables development teams to ship features faster and more confidently, with complete visibility and control over their feature flags.

**Evolution and Expertise**
Starting as an A/B testing tool tailored for product and marketing teams, DevCycle has metamorphosed into a versatile platform that handles millions of end-users and billions of event launches. This evolution underscores their in-depth understanding of high-scale operational demands, making them a trusted partner for some of the world's leading brands.

**Key Features & Benefits**
- **Flexible Integration**: DevCycle provides an integrated Feature Management solution, reducing the time developers spend managing feature flags, allowing them to focus on what they do best—building exceptional software.
- **Scalable and Cost-Efficient**: With its low-latency and fault-tolerant edge network, the platform ensures that teams can manage feature flags with reliability while also keeping costs in check.
- **Advanced Functionalities**: DevCycle includes features like real-time updates, gradual rollouts, A/B testing, and permissions management, ensuring teams can implement changes carefully and track their impact.

**A Supportive Developer Ecosystem**
DevCycle is part of the OpenFeature ecosystem, supporting open-source SDKs and enabling developers to avoid vendor lock-in. This transparency and flexibility are hallmarks of their approach, allowing easy migrations and provider swaps.

**Pricing Model**
True to its ethos, DevCycle embraces a usage-based pricing model rather than charging by seat. This approach ensures that all team members can access the platform, fostering collaboration and maximizing value.

**Team and Location**
Located in Toronto, Canada, DevCycle has a dedicated team of 55 professionals, all focused on enhancing the developer experience and streamlining software releases.

**Conclusion**
In a fast-paced technological landscape where speed and reliability are paramount, DevCycle offers a straightforward, scalable solution for feature flag management. By doing so, it not only aids developers but ultimately empowers companies to innovate without the burden of complexity. If you’re interested in cutting-edge feature management, check out their [website](http://devcycle.com) and consider signing up for a trial today—your dev team might thank you later!
